patthana17.9:1.1: Kusalaṃ ācayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naācayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.9:2.1: Kusalaṃ apacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naapacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.9:3.1: Abyākataṃ nevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
